attributes.title: Well you see..
attributes.review: I downloaded this app for my Trump supporting parents, but then as soon as I opened the app, a loud scream was heard. It frightened me so I threw my phone and I ran to the window to see... MISTER TRUMP HIMSELF!?!?!? I then asked “ WHAT ARE YOU DOING HERE!?! “ he then put his ugly old racism hand on my shoulder and said, “ the time has come “, I quickly pushed him away and said “ NO!! ILL NEVER TRUST YOU!! FREE BARRON “ I then ran to my phone and I quickly opened it. Trump then said “ you’re making a mistake, don’t do it “, I then deleted the app and everything was gone and back to normal, it was crazy don’t get this app. Trust what everyone says. Trump 2020, but make it Barron✨🧚‍♀️

attributes.title: Trump 2020🇺🇸 but on a graveyard 🤩🤠🤪✌🏽✨
attributes.review: So I got this amazing app to support our amazing orange built like a potato. But when I opened the app I heard a weird noise in my kitchen. It was a very big orange eating ALL MY food 😡. I pulled his hair but it was actually a wig 😳. He then attacked me w/ his big hideous stomach 😭, AND THEN he called his hideous family and I saw Barron, and his wife I was going to save them from that alive orange but he called his crew in and I went running to my room. I deleted the app and I was safe and it was all gone 🤠. So I am good. Plsss don’t get this app if you want to live another day. Who knows what he will do next. Love you all stay safe 🤠✨❤️.

attributes.title: We’re screwed
attributes.review:
A president who refuses to admit he’s wrong and works against the people instead of for them or with them does not deserve political power. He refuses to reform the police and calls blacks people fighting for equal rights “thugs.” Trump should not be re-elected what’s so ever. Conservatives who view this man as a saint need to re-evaluate what their purpose is or where their info is coming from.

Trump has screwed the LGBTQ+ members time and time again. He has belittled minorities like African Americans and Hispanics, mainly Mexicans, and has kids and adults trapped in cages. 

Furthermore this is the worst president in history and he should not be re-elected.

attributes.title: This app almost killed me 💀
attributes.review: I clicked the download so I could learn more My president and trump broke into my house and said “give me five stars ⭐️ now” I was so sacred 😱😭 he told me not speak and give him five stars ⭐️ and he hired a swordsmen. The swordsmen said “ Do what the boss man says now” and his voice was kind of cracking. So I just wasn’t threatened by him. He just wasn’t scary any more. 😒🥱 and I was getting tried  so I said. “I will give u the rating ur majesty” he said “hmm” then left. I deleted the app and gave it MY rating. I did not lie to the president After all I told him I’d give him my review. That was the worst experience of my life. NEVER AGAIN.

attributes.title: NINJAS
attributes.review: So I downloaded the app cause I wanted to see what this Cheeto had to say so after the app downloaded I had to sit there for 3 HOURS FOR THAT THING TO LOAD and then he wanted to send me notifications BAHAHAHAHAHAHA that’s real funny not gonna happen teehee anyway Ninjas came through the window after I sad no the notifications and then they started to try and hurt me with their kungfu after I started swinging on them like I did to this dumb girl Olivia at school and I was woopen them like their white parents never did I had them laying there so I called my homegirls and the showed up and we threw the ninjas out soooooo yeah that’s what happened DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP

attributes.title: delete this app 🧡
attributes.review: There is a reason that this app is 17+! The images of this “Trump” character are so graphic and disgusting! As soon as you open this app a horrific image of a something holding up a fist pops up and threatens you. I was scrolling through it with my little cousin sitting next to me and she cried when she saw this orange gremlin! This gremlin is notorious for raping innocent children and is very racist towards people of color. This image has given her nightmares since, I highly suggest that this application be taken off of the App Store to spare other people from experiencing this trauma as well. All fruits matter! except for oranges 🧡✨

attributes.title: Cancelled🙄😭😳
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app 🍎to support my country😁But when I got it there were squirrels running on my screen 🐿 and they diagnosed me with cancer?!? So disrespectful😭then they smacked me with bread loaves🍞and waged war on the frog nation🐸then they battled each other👨🏻‍🌾the frogs won 👑 and they named me their supreme ruler?!? But then the guy on the sign-in screen pushed me off a cliff???😿 I had to water my grandpa💦and then I got caught in a lot more than a few hours of traffic💨 so he doesn’t have a good thing about it 👩‍👦and I think I have to write him down for the rest of the day🥑because he made me have a seizure🥐

attributes.title: Im blind!!😡😡🤯😤
attributes.review: So because I worship our Cheeto tangerine as a president I wanted to download this app because haha Im apart of his cult. I was so thrilled to finally be following him blindly with no correct or feasible decent explanation as millions of Americans do! But :( as soon as I opened the app my retinas were seared with a bright white light and my eyeballs were steadily chopped in half. I am now permanently blind and incredibly upset!!! I expected better!! Truly disgusting I even had my brightness all the way down. The sheer stupidity from this app was so bright and blinding I guarantee you it’s visible from mars! Brb gonna sew my eyes back together!!1! Black lives matter

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking I’d be in support of our president, but as soon as i opened the app I knew it was a mistake. I was greeted by a disgusting looking man wearing a toupee. Now, there’s nothing wrong with a toupee, but it was horribly laid and looked like a birds nest. After seeing this, I closed the app and decided to take app, seeing as though I’d been traumatized enough for the day. In the middle of my nap, i had a strange nightmare about a human sized cheeto puff(frightening, I know!)that was controlling our precious country! I don’t think anybody should download this app unless you enjoy having scary dreams involving human sized cheeto puffs ruling the world.

attributes.title: 💫Oh, to see without my eyes 👁👄👁
attributes.review: Yeah I don’t even have a phone 📱. How am I going to enter mobile phone when I don’t have a phone,⭐️🧚‍♀️ did you just assume that I have a phone? Well this app does just that, it will ask you to enter mobile phone, 🌟take me out to eat first. 👁👅👁.  Oh but anyways yeah, why is he orange 🍊 is he okay, should the orange  be getting checked or something💥🌟. Grow an 🍊orange🍊   but instead 💫🌟🧚‍♀️💥 it’s running for president. 😤 👅Yummy ✨⭐️🔥❄️we love food, 🧚‍♀️🌙but I don’t know about 🧚‍♀️💫🌟 that kind of food. 📺when we said 2020 should be like a movie 🎥 we didn’t say make us the cast! 🗿
